file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  description: "API des Ladesäulenregisters der Bundesnetzagentur"
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: "Bundesnetzagentur: Ladesäulenregister"

paths:
  /query:
    get:
      summary: Query für alle Ladesäulen
      parameters:
        - name: geometry
          in: query
          description: Geometry filter. URL-enkodiertes JSON Objekt vom Typ `Geometry`
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: geometryType
          in: query
          description: Art der Geometry
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: esriGeometryEnvelope
            enum: [esriGeometryEnvelope, esriGeometryPoint, esriGeometryPolyline, esriGeometryPolygon, esriGeometryMultipoint]
        - name: f
          in: query
          style: form
          description: Ausgabeformat der Daten. Default ist 'html'.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [json, geojson, pbf, html]
        - name: outFields
          in: query
          description: "Auswahl der Felder, die ausgegeben werden sollen, durch Komma getrennt"
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            default: '*'
        - name: objectIds
          in: query
          description: Komma-separierte Liste von IDs (integer), filtert nach den einzelnen Objekten
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: '42,123,666'
        - name: orderByFields
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: returnGeometry
          in: query
          style: form
          description: ""
          required: false
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: spatialRel
          in: query
          style: form
          description: Spatial Relationships
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [esriSpatialRelIntersects, esriSpatialRelContains, esriSpatialRelCrosses, esriSpatialRelEnvelopeIntersects, esriSpatialRelIndexIntersects, esriSpatialRelOverlaps, esriSpatialRelTouches, esriSpatialRelWithin, esriSpatialRelDisjoint]
        - name: inSR
          in: query
          description: Input Spatial Reference
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: outSR
          in: query
          description: Output Spatial Reference
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: maxRecordCountFactor
          in: query
          description: ''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: resultType
          in: query
          description: ''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [none, standard, tile]
        - name: quantizationParameters
          in: query
          description: URL-enkodiertes JSON Objekt vom Typ `QuantizationParameter`
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: where
          in: query
          description: SQL "where" Filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: having
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: time
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: distance
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          example: '0.0'
        - name: units
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [esriSRUnit_Meter, esriSRUnit_StatuteMile, esriSRUnit_Foot, esriSRUnit_Kilometer, esriSRUnit_NauticalMile, esriSRUnit_USNauticalMile]
        - name: geometryPrecision
          in: query
          required: false
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: featureEncoding
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [esriDefault, esriCompressedShapeBuffer]
        - name: groupByFieldsForStatistics
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: cacheHint
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnExtentOnly
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnZ
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnIdsOnly
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnCentroid
          in: query
          description: ''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnExceededLimitFeatures
          in: query
          description: ''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: datumTransformation
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: resultOffset
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: applyVCSProjection
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: outStatistics
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: returnDistinctValues
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: multipatchOption
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [none, xyFootprint, stripMaterials, embedMaterials, externalizeTextures, extent]
        - name: returnM
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: maxAllowableOffset
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: returnCountOnly
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnUniqueIdsOnly
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: returnQueryGeometry
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
        - name: resultRecordCount
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: sqlFormat
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [none, standard, native]
        - name: token
          in: query
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: returnGeodetic
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/StationOverview'
      servers:
        - url: https://services6.arcgis.com/6jU7RmJig2Wwo1b0/ArcGIS/rest/services/Ladesaeulenregister/FeatureServer/7

components:
  schemas:
    StationOverview:
      type: object
      properties:
        objectIdFieldName: 
          type: string
        uniqueIdField: 
          type: object
          properties: 
            name: 
              type: string
            isSystemMaintained: 
              type: boolean
        globalIdFieldName: 
          type: string
        geometryType: 
          type: string
        spatialReference: 
          type: object
          properties: 
            wkid: 
              type: integer
              format: int32
            latestWkid: 
              type: integer
              format: int32
        transform: 
          type: object
          properties: 
            originPosition: 
              type: string
            scale: 
              type: array
              items: 
                type: number
            translate: 
              type: array
              items: 
                type: number
        fields: 
          type: array
          items: 
            type: object
            properties: 
              name: 
                type: string
              type: 
                type: string
              alias: 
                type: string
              sqlType: 
                type: string
              domain: 
                type: string
                format: nullable
              defaultValue: 
                type: string
                format: nullable
        features: 
          type: array
          items: 
            type: object
            properties: 
              attributes: 
                type: object
                properties: 
                  ID: 
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
                  Betreiber_: 
                    type: string
                  Standort_: 
                    type: string
                  Längengrad_: 
                    type: number
                  Breitengrad_: 
                    type: number
                  für_die_Überschrift_: 
                    type: string
                  Anzahl_Ladepunkte_: 
                    type: string
                  Art_des_Ladepunktes_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Steckdose_Typ_2__1_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Kupplung_Typ_2__1_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_Kupplung_Combo__1_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Schuko__1_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_5_polig__1_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_3_polig__1_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_CHAdeMO__1_: 
                    type: string
                  Sonstige_Stecker__1_: 
                    type: string
                  Nennleistung_Ladepunkt_1_: 
                    type: string
                  Public_Key__1_: 
                    type: string
                  Art_des_Ladepunktes_2_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Steckdose_Typ_2__2_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Kupplung_Typ_2__2_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_Kupplung_Combo__2_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Schuko__2_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_5_polig__2_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_3_polig__2_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_CHAdeMO__2_: 
                    type: string
                  Sonstige_Stecker__2_: 
                    type: string
                  Nennleistung_Ladepunkt_2_: 
                    type: string
                  Public_Key__2_: 
                    type: string
                  Art_des_Ladepunktes_3_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Steckdose_Typ_2__3_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Kupplung_Typ_2__3_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_Kupplung_Combo__3_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Schuko__3_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_5_polig__3_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_3_polig__3_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_CHAdeMO__3_: 
                    type: string
                  Sonstige_Stecker__3_: 
                    type: string
                  Nennleistung_Ladepunkt_3_: 
                    type: string
                  Public_Key__3_: 
                    type: string
                  Art_des_Ladepunktes_4_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Steckdose_Typ_2__4_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Kupplung_Typ_2__4_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_Kupplung_Combo__4_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_Schuko__4_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_5_polig__4_: 
                    type: string
                  AC_CEE_3_polig__4_: 
                    type: string
                  DC_CHAdeMO__4_: 
                    type: string
                  Sonstige_Stecker__4_: 
                    type: string
                  Nennleistung_Ladepunkt_4_: 
                    type: string
                  Public_Key__4_: 
                    type: string
                  OBJECTID: 
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
    Geometry:
      type: object
      properties:
        xmin: 
          type: number
        ymin: 
          type: number
        xmax: 
          type: number
        ymax: 
          type: number
        spatialReference: 
          type: object
          properties: 
            wkid: 
              type: integer
              format: int32
            latestWkid: 
              type: integer
              format: int32
    QuantizationParameter:
      type: object
      properties:
        mode: 
          type: string
        originPosition: 
          type: string
        tolerance: 
          type: number
        extent: 
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Geometry'

externalDocs:
  description: "Ausführlichere Dokumentation"
  url: "https://services6.arcgis.com/6jU7RmJig2Wwo1b0/ArcGIS/rest/services/Ladesaeulenregister/FeatureServer/7"
